reviewText:
Ronald Reagan,  FDR,  Charlie Chaplin,  Yellow Ribbons,  Great Songs,  The American Flag,  Rallies,  Great Speeches,  and more!

Come along for a fascinating look at 80 years of patriotism in America.  It's all here--from apple pie to yellow ribbons... from WW1 Bond rallies to the classic songs of America.

This is the ultimate tribute to American patriotism and a video you'll keep forever.  Made in America and at top quality SP speed by Cabin Fever Productions.
